page.title: 15THREE GIRLS VIEW OF 1985
page.content: Claire James: Life for kids in 1985 is a pushover.Nothing is so strict as it was about 50 years ago.Teachers and parents are soft compared to your nans and grandads' teachers.Nowadays you can nearly get away with anything! Katie Wares: Everyone has different taste in pop groups .Most girls like Wham! Spandua Ballet & Duran Duran.The number "1" at the moment is Sister Sledge with Frankie!.My favuorite pop groups are WHAM MADONNA & PAUL HARDCASTLE.!!! Julie Davis: Fashion today are Farrahs Pringles and Lyle & Scotts.Fred Perrys are fashionable for girls' tee shirts and tight pencil skirts to go with them. Hairstyles for girls are pageboy cuts & flicks are in fashion too.Which goes to show girls are tops in every way.
